data:item.name: LVGL ePaper Smartlabel KW45
data:item.display_title: BLE smart label based on LVGL using Waveshare e-ink display and KW45
data:item.overview: This is an example project to demonstrate the use of GUI Guider and LVGL in the context of a BLE Smart Label using NXP KW45B41Z-EVK or K32W148-EVK boards, a Waveshare 2.9" E-Ink display and NXP IoT Toolbox application.
